description: Front End Developer This expert focuses on an application or website's visible and interactive aspects that users directly engage with.
name: James Kim

description: Back-end developer Their responsibilities lie in managing the behind-the-scenes aspects, encompassing infrastructure and databases, that enable an application to operate efficiently.
name: Smith

description: Full Stack Developer This versatile professional possesses broader skills and can handle the entire design process from inception to completion. They are adept at both front end and back-end development.
name: Rachel Song
